body_html:
You never need to preserve scratch space (it's called workspace in cudnn API). You need reserveSpace that was computed in forward for backward, in rnn.py it is called fn.reserve
https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/backends/cudnn/rnn.py#L281
You don't need to clone it as it is not modified in backward.
